NEWS

July 25, 2023

MAGICAL is online! Check out our newly published Bayesian method that infers regulatory circuits from sample-paired single-cell multiomics data on Nature Computational Science.


May 8, 2023

Honored to have been selected as one of the few recipients for The Immuno-Oncology Translational Network (IOTN) Semi-annual Steering Committee Early Career Scientist Speaker Award and presented our collaborative work on smart T-cell therapeutics in treating cancer.


July 11, 2022

Our work on single-cell multi-omics methods for Staphylococcus aureus subtype diagonosis was successfully presented at ISMB 2022! Thank you for all the insightful questions and conversations.


July 8, 2022

Personal site officially launches.
